content:
ActorServiceAttribute ActorServiceAttribute Class

In this Article

Edit

This attributes allows configuring the properties of the actor service. The attribute is applied on the actor type.

Syntax

Declaration

[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Class)]
public sealed class ActorServiceAttribute : Attribute, _Attribute<AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Class)>
Public NotInheritable Class ActorServiceAttribute
    Inherits Attribute
    Implements _Attribute

Constructors summary

ActorServiceAttribute()
ActorServiceAttribute()

Initializes a new instance of the ActorServiceAttribute class.

Properties summary

Name
Name

The relative name of the actor service. This name will be combined with the application name to provide the full name of the actor service.

Constructors

  • Edit
    ActorServiceAttribute()
    ActorServiceAttribute()

    Initializes a new instance of the ActorServiceAttribute class.

    public ActorServiceAttribute()Public Sub New

Properties

  • Edit
    Name
    Name

    The relative name of the actor service. This name will be combined with the application name to provide the full name of the actor service. 

    public string Name { get; set; }Public Property Name As String

    Property Value

    • String
      String

      The name of the actor service relative to the application name.

    Remarks

    By default, the actor service name is derived from the type of the actor interface (GetFabricServiceName(Type, String)). However, in case when an actor interface is implemented by more than one actor, including by a derived type, the name cannot be determined from the actor interface in an unambiguous manner. In that case, the name of the actor service must be configured using this property of the ActorServiceAttribute.

System.AttributeUsageAttribute
